actionPackage

Class ActionAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • actionPackage.ActionAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - - In which type did we use the action. It can be on a direction, a monster, an item or another action (nd. see the {UseAction.java})
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AttackAction, LookAction, MoveAction, UseAction

    public abstract class ActionAdapter<T>
extends Object
implements Action
    The Action adapter permit to adapt our action menu to the different kind of actions and her specifications.
    Author:
    Despelchin and Pereira
